paragraphs.paragraph: HRAS that is bound to GTP binds RAF1. RAF1 that is bound to HRAS phosphorylates itself at Thr491 and Ser494. RAF1 phosphorylated at Thr491 and Ser494 is activated. Active RAF1 phosphorylates MAP2K1 at Ser218 and Ser222. MAP2K1 phosphorylated at Ser218 and Ser222 is activated. Active MAP2K1 phosphorylates ERK2 at Tyr187 and Thr185.

sentences.sentence: HRAS that is bound to GTP binds RAF1.
RAF1 that is bound to HRAS phosphorylates itself at Thr491 and Ser494.
RAF1 phosphorylated at Thr491 and Ser494 is activated.
Active RAF1 phosphorylates MAP2K1 at Ser218 and Ser222.
MAP2K1 phosphorylated at Ser218 and Ser222 is activated.
Active MAP2K1 phosphorylates ERK2 at Tyr187 and Thr185.
